page.title: 15ASPECTS OF RHU SCHOOL LIFE.
page.content: A recent change that we,the pupils of Primary 6/7 have noticed in our every_ day school work, is the increased use of the computer in the classroom.Our school has two computers,a Commodore Pet and this BBC micro which most classes make use of. The school uniform which,although not compulsory,is worn by most children and comprises of white shirt,grey skirt/trousers,a black and gold diagonally striped tie and a grey jersey. School dinners are cooked on the premises and today's menu consisted of Sweet & Sour Pork or Mince & Doughballs,Creamed potatoes and carrots followed by a choice of Baked Chocolate chip sponge and raspberry sauce or Pancakes & syrup.57% of all pupils have a school lunch,32% bring a packed lunch and 11% go home for their lunch.
